text: Robert Patrick (born Robert Patrick Hammond Jr.; November 5, 1958) is an American actor. He is known for his roles in Die Hard 2, Terminator 2: Judgment Day, Spy Kids, Walk the Line, Wayne's World, and in Identity Thief. He won a Saturn Award in 2000 for his role in The Sopranos. Patrick was born in Marietta, Georgia. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Robert Patrick bio at CBS, The Unit Category:Saturn Award winners Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Robert Patrick
